OBSTRUCTIVE DISEASE PRESENT
DLCO usually
normal in asthma and chronic bronchitis but # in
emphysema
RESTRICTIVE DISEASE PRESENT
DLCO adjusted
for alveolar volume usually # in interstitial lung dis
eases and atelectasis and normal in neuromuscular
diseases, chest wall abnormalities, and obesity
ISOLATED
DLCO
ABNORMALITY

# DLCO may result from anemia, increased
carboxyhemoglobinemia, PE, and pulmonary hyper
tension; " DLCO may result from pulmonary hemor
rhage, obesity, left to right shunts, and polycythemia
